name: Big Dino Hunter Simulator 3D - PRO No ads
name_original: Big Dino Hunter Simulator 3D - PRO No ads
description:
New survival game are waiting for you!
Use different kinds of blocks and create you own craft world!
Beware big dinosaurs! Collect secret items, cut the tree, get ores!

Big Dino Hunter Simulator 3D PRO game features
► No ads version!
► Exploration game!
► New sandbox survival with open world!
► Build and craft!
► Discover 5 big islands!
► Beware of dinosaurs!
► Swim across ocean!
► Try to find secrets on each island!
► You should to survive. See on hunger bar - search for food, hunt Dino for meat!

Start survival on five islands!
